steps.title: Access Settings
steps.description: On your Peloton tablet, tap the top or bottom right corner of the screen to open the Settings menu.

steps.title: Open Developer Options
steps.description: Go to Settings -> System -> Developer Options (if you don't see Developer Options, you need to enable it first using the Developer Mode Guide)

steps.title: Enable Wireless Debugging
steps.description: In Developer Options, find and enable "Wireless debugging"

steps.title: Open Wireless Debugging Settings
steps.description: Tap directly on the text "Wireless debugging" to open the wireless debugging settings window

steps.title: Pair Device with Pairing Code
steps.description: In the wireless debugging window, tap "Pair device with pairing code"

steps.title: Note Pairing Information
steps.description:
A dialog will appear showing:
- WiFi pairing code (6 digits)
- IP address
- Port number

Keep this window open and click Next to enter this information in OpenPelo
